actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Burr.
On agreeing to the Burr amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute directs Federal agencies with regulatory responsibilities to differentiate between animal fats or vegetable oils and other types of oils and greases, including petroleum, when writing regulations.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute not preprinted in the Congressional Record.
